hero.headline:
Cook with
Passion.
hero.sub: Join the largest community of home chefs turning their kitchens into thriving local businesses.
hero.slide1Quote: Homemade gave me the platform to share my grandmother's recipes with the world.
hero.slide2Quote: I started baking for friends, now I run a full-time bakery from my kitchen.
hero.slide3Quote: Food is the best way to tell my story. Homemade makes it possible.
hero.slide4Quote: Cooking as a couple has never been more rewarding. We love our customers!
hero.slide5Quote: Homemade is the reason I could quit my corporate job. I'm finally free.

howItWorks.title: Your journey starts here
howItWorks.subtitle: We've made it incredibly simple to turn your kitchen into a professional workspace.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up in minutes. Share your culinary story, set your schedule, and customize your storefront.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Upload photos of your signature dishes. You set the prices and available quantities.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Receive orders and cook with passion. Connect with neighbors who crave authentic homemade food.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Get paid instantly for every order. Build a loyal following and grow your home business.

features.title: Run Your Home Food Business
features.subtitle: the Easy Way with Homemade
features.feature1Point1: Build your store, menu, and pricing in one place.
features.feature1Point2: Upload photos, showcase your dishes, and start accepting orders.
features.feature2Title: Share Your Storefront and Get Orders Faster
features.feature2Point1: Built-in tools turn your phone into a sales engine.
features.feature2Point2: From your first order to your 5,000th, Homemade simplifies sales.
features.feature3Title: Track, Fulfill, and Grow with Ease
features.feature3Point1: Manage pickup, scheduled orders, and track performance from your dashboard.
features.feature3Point2: Real-time order tracking for you and your customers
features.feature4Title: Build Your Brand and Market Like a Pro
features.feature4Point1: Create a professional storefront, logo, and branding.
features.feature4Point2: Use marketing tools to attract more customers and grow your business

earnings.title: Start Earning as a Chef
earnings.intro1: Join Homemade and turn your passion for cooking into a thriving business. Our platform connects you with hungry neighbors who crave authentic, homemade meals.
earnings.intro2: Use our calculator to estimate your potential earnings based on your pricing, availability, and meal capacity.
earnings.benefit1: Set your own prices and schedule
earnings.benefit2: Work from the comfort of your home
earnings.benefit3: Build a loyal customer base in your neighborhood
earnings.benefit4: Get support with marketing and legal requirements

pricing.title: Choose a plan and start your business today
pricing.subtitle: Your dream of sharing your food with the world starts here. With your beautiful, ready-to-go storefront, customers can order and pay online in just a few clicks.

faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.a1: Homemade is your personal restaurant platform. We empower you to cook in your own kitchen and sell meals to neighbors, handling the tech while you handle the food.
faq.a2: No culinary degree required! You just need a KVK registration and to follow standard food safety rules. If you love cooking, you're qualified.
faq.a3: Simple direct deposits. You set prices, we collect payments, and you request a payout whenever you like. Funds arrive in 2-4 days.
faq.a4: It depends on your hustle! Many chefs earn €200-€2000+ monthly. You keep the majority of your sales; we take a small fee to run the platform.
faq.a5: You package the food. We recommend eco-friendly containers and can connect you with suppliers. Beautiful packaging keeps customers coming back.
faq.a6: Not if you don't want to! You can offer Delivery, Pickup, or both. You set the radius and the hours. It's your business, your rules.
faq.q7: Is it available in my city?
faq.a7: We're live in Amsterdam, Rotterdam, and Enschede, with more cities launching monthly. Sign up to get notified when we reach your area.
faq.a8: We do the heavy lifting with app marketing, SEO, and social campaigns. We also give you tools to share your menu with your own local network.
faq.a9: Always. Toggle your availability off in the app whenever you need a vacation or a rest day. No penalties, just freedom.

blog.title:
Insights for the
Modern Chef
blog.subtitle: Discover tips, trends, and success stories to help you grow your home-based food business in the Netherlands.

footer.tagline: Empowering home chefs to share their culinary passion with the world. Authentic meals, made with love, delivered to your door.
footer.newsletterText: Join our newsletter for fresh updates and chef stories.

cta.headline:
Start your culinary
empire today.
cta.subheadline: Join thousands of home chefs who are changing the way the world eats. Freedom, passion, and profit await.
cta.noCredit: No credit card required for sign up. 100% free for chefs to start.

foodSafety.title: Food Safety is the Secret Ingredient
foodSafety.subtitle: It's not just ticking boxes, it's mastering skills to handle, prep, and serve meals confidently, ensuring every bite is safe and satisfying.
foodSafety.whyText: At Homemade, every chef must be certified by the NVWA, obtain KVK and Eherkenning, and follow HACCP and strict regulations. We also conduct regular checkups and ensure their kitchen passes our inspection. This ensures every meal is safe, satisfying, and prepared with confidence.
foodSafety.trustText: Receive help with social media, brand identity, promotional materials, and more to elevate your presence. We verify every chef so our customers can order with complete peace of mind.

pricingHero.title:
Big Business Tools,
Small Business Budget
pricingHero.subtitle: Why pay for a full team when you can have it all in one place? Homemade gives you everything you need to succeed — order management, branding, marketing, and more, without the hefty price tag.
